00014 #include "config.h"

00016 #include "Packet.h"

00022 class SaveLengthHelper {
00023 public:
00025    SaveLengthHelper( Packet* packet, int startPos ) :
00026          m_packet( packet ),
00027          m_startPos( startPos ),
00028          m_lengthPos( MAX_UINT32 ) {
00029    }
00030 
00032    void writeDummyLength( int& length_pos ) {
00033       m_lengthPos = length_pos;
00034       m_packet->incWriteLong( length_pos, 0 );
00035    }
00036    
00038    uint32 updateLengthUsingEndPos( int end_pos ) {
00039       MC2_ASSERT( m_lengthPos != -1 );
00040       int tmpPos = m_lengthPos;
00041       uint32 length = end_pos - m_startPos;
00042       m_packet->incWriteLong( tmpPos, length );
00043       return length;
00044    }
00045 private:
00047    Packet* m_packet;
00049    int m_startPos;
00051    int m_lengthPos;
00052    
00053 };
00054 
00059 class LoadLengthHelper {
00060 public:
00062    LoadLengthHelper( const Packet* packet, int start_pos,
00063                      const char* dbg = NULL ) :
00064          m_packet( packet ),
00065          m_startPos( start_pos ),
00066          m_length( MAX_UINT32 ),
00067          m_dbg( dbg ) {
00068    }
00069 
00071    uint32 loadLength( int& pos ) {
00072       m_length = m_packet->incReadLong( pos );
00073       return m_length;
00074    }
00075 
00077    uint32 skipUnknown( int& pos ) const {
00078       MC2_ASSERT( m_length != MAX_UINT32 );
00079       if ( m_dbg ) {
00080          if ( uint32(pos) != m_startPos + m_length ) {
00081             mc2dbg << m_dbg << ": skipping unknown data - ok if mixed versions"
00082                    << endl;
00083          }
00084       }
00085       pos = m_startPos + m_length;
00086       return m_length;
00087    }
00088    
00090    uint32 available( int& pos ) const {
00091       if( (pos - m_startPos) < m_length ) {
00092          return pos - m_startPos;
00093       } else {
00094          return 0;
00095       }
00096    }
00097    
00098 private:
00100    const Packet* m_packet;
00102    uint32 m_startPos;
00104    uint32 m_length;
00106    const char* m_dbg;
00107 };
